ComicInfo.Title: Dog Days Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
A series of vicious short stories howling straight out of the pages of STRAY DOGS, 2021’s surprise cartoon/horror smash hit! In DOG DAYS, each stray will get their moment to shine—questions will be answered, mysteries will be solved, and old wounds will be torn open. Starting this December…every dog has its day.
*List of covers and their creators:* {}*Notes* Carnivore Comics variant by Vincenzo Riccardi connects with Stray Dogs: Dog Days #2 - Part 2. Carnivore Comics variant by Mirka Andolfo connects with Stray Dogs: Dog Days #2 - Part 2. Nerd Store's Ghostbusters homage virgin metal exclusive was never made available to the public. It was made on special permission and given to their employees and industry professionals as gifts. Less than 30 were made. Comic Bug variant by Trish Forstner and Tony Fleecs connects with Stray Dogs: Dog Days #1 - Part 2.
